= Installation =

  # Add 'sms' to your INSTALLED_APPS list
    {{{
    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        'django.contrib.auth',
        'django.contrib.contenttypes',
        'django.contrib.sessions',
        'django.contrib.admin',
        'sms',
        ...
    )
    }}}
  # Run syncdb to install the database table and install the fixtures
    {{{
    python manage.py syncdb
    }}}
  # Enjoy!
